item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or by Email to get in touch. I am open to any technical debate about my topics of research, discuss collaboration, consulting or join working or research opportunities. About | Contact | Portfolio | Projects

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: What I Do? I enjoy having a “White Hat Hacker” attitude and mentality. This type of personality leads me to have a set of practical experiences with a wide range of technologies. See below in the following selection of what I have worked on. Web scraping. Data Analytics. Data visualization. Programming languages. Math & Statistics. Machine Learning. Integrated development environment (IDE). Data cloud deployment.
